title: Japanese Temple Render

title: Final Bachelor’s Project
snippet: Final Project of the Computer Science and Multimedia Bachelor’s. This was an experimental project with the objective of testing various Unity features, like URP, Shader Graph and Behaviour Trees, t...
content: Final Project of the Computer Science and Multimedia Bachelor’s. This was an experimental project with the objective of testing various Unity features, like URP, Shader Graph and Behaviour Trees, that were not covered originally in the Unity modulo.Final Grade: 17 / 20Full ReportNote: The report is in portuguese.
